### Note: Most of these tropes come from the TV Tropes Website ([https://tvtropes.org](https://tvtropes.org/)). Below is a summary of each trope; follow the link to see more details on the trope, examples, and and links to related ones.

```{r tropes_table_edit, echo=FALSE,message = FALSE,warning=FALSE, results=FALSE}
tropes<-readxl::read_excel("./assignments/01_movies/tropes.xlsx") %>% 
  select(-Category) %>% 
  mutate(ID = row_number(), .before=Trope)


code <- strsplit(tropes$Trope, " ")
code<-sapply(code, function(x){
      toupper(paste(substring(x, 1, 1), collapse = ""))
  })
code<-as.data.frame(code)
code <- code %>% 
  mutate(ID = row_number())
str(code)
str(tropes)
tropes <- left_join(code,tropes) %>% 
  select(ID, Trope, Code=code,Description,Link)


tropes <- tropes %>%
  mutate(across(everything(), ~replace_na(.x, "")))
```
